import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import {Post} from "../post/post"; import {Observable} from "rxjs"; import {ActivatedRoute, Router} from "@angular/router"; import {AdminService} from "../../services/admin.service"; @Component({ selector: 'app-table', templateUrl: './table.component.html', styleUrls: ['./table.component.scss'], }) export class TableComponent implements OnInit { postList!:Observable; constructor(private adminService: AdminService, private router: Router, private activatedRoute: ActivatedRoute) {} ngOnInit(): void { this.postList = this.adminService.getPostList() } }
